content.raw:
The polaris_ranger_ev model that is currently in gazebo_models has no moving parts, just a static mesh that was the first draft given by our artist. It has no visual coloring, and we haven't verified the scaling. We are currently working on uploading the final mesh, which has required some updates to our COLLADA parser. We are also adding simple collision shapes and moving parts (see [this gazebo_models pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/5) and [this branch](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/commits/all/tip/branch%28%22polaris_scpeters%22%29)).

Based on your comments, I'm wondering if we should use the full mesh for laser scanning purposes and the simple shapes for physics. I'm going to discuss this with John and Nate.
